verses.name: Jeremiah 7:5
verses.text: For if ye throughly amend your ways and your doings; if ye throughly execute judgment between a man and his neighbour;

verses.name: Jeremiah 7:6
verses.text: If ye oppress not the stranger, the fatherless, and the widow, and shed not innocent blood in this place, neither walk after other gods to your hurt:

verses.name: Jeremiah 7:7
verses.text: Then will I cause you to dwell in this place, in the land that I gave to your fathers, for ever and ever.

verses.name: Jeremiah 7:8
verses.text: Behold, ye trust in lying words, that cannot profit.
